content: It lags on my phone. Every premium games should have free trials to test the compatibility. It sucks that i paid then i dont get to play it properly.

New gripe. Half the time I hit the jump button, I only get a half jump. It has screwed me over on platforming sections and making the game unplayable. Will put back to 5* when fixed Only gripe was that you couldn't customise controls and now you've provided a great level of customisation. Thanks guys and can't wait for the rest of the content :)

this is an amazing game I play with controller it gets a little laggy sometimes and some controls u. an only perform on screen but I am excited to play this amazing game on my phone and with a little work cud be a 5 star game all the way

Who would've thought the man that brought us the Castlevania franchise can come up with another masterpiece. So far it's just exactly how I would expect from a genius like Igarashi, the controls may not be perfect but everything else is superb.üëçüòç

Great game, though it has some issues. Touch screen controls sometimes become unresponsive. Graphical lag is an issue, especially during "high jump". Maybe add an option for a D-pad instead of just a virtual joystick?
Find the game not running as smoothly as Ps4 remote play.Why they port it over with the lag.Fix the issues for the lag.
needs an update for stability other than that it's playable

I love castlevania sotn, and I have played more metroidvanias I care to admit. So trust me when I say this is not a good one. This is a bad port. The game is ridden with bad technical issues like framerate skips, input delay, and other nuisances like dialogues not showing, even on a flagship phone. What's worse is that even tho the performance is bad, the game not pretty to look at either, as the models, lighting, scenery, all look bad. Stay away.
This game is fun. I have this on the ps4. My only complaint is that you should be able to customise your controls.But other than that I like this game.
love it! Can't wait for full controller support. Found a bug when I try to change my look. The barber doesn't do anything and I can't get off the chair, so I have to restart.
UPDATE: epic.
Boss rush is bugged i think. No zangetsu (he doesnt spawn)

Still keeping on 1 star, after the February 2021 update. They add features to gain money. No surprise Netease you always grab money. They still not fixed controller support. The frames are laggy. Using Samsung Galaxy S21 Ultra and Tab S7. Used Razor controller, Moga and generic one. None work. It don't look like they did much other than add money grabbing DLC. Iga be ashamed of yourself as the very people who have gave you kick-start money, sort your mobile game mess out. Square Enix do better.
I now give it 1 star after update, like come on the framrates still drops and the buttons suck, like seriously, I just have to delete the game because it's just so buggy
Samsung galaxy S10e user. Running on epic settings vsync is on Running 60 fps mode epic new update is great

Pretty fun game and runs smoothly. Only issue is the jumping. Jumps are challenging because many times the character's jump is shorten because of not pressing the button long enough. I wish that feature was turned off.
excellente!
it's getting better! 60fps really works and it rarely stutters. please just let the menu be operated by controllers, and then it's a 5 star from me. please keep porting console games!
the game is good but it's becoming unplayable because of screen becoming white with only sound after cutscene, please fix this
Game is way too hard!!! Oh well..3‚òÜ for graphics. Uninstalled.

I'm playing this game with my low end android. It has some lagging issues but I'm actually having fun. All you have to do on settings is to put graphics on Low and play it. If I have one of the newer phones like galaxy S20 it will be awesome on it.

the mobile controls are a bit clunky. when you need to jump quickly or move sometimes you just stand there because your not pressing the icon precisely. the biggest issue that takes away the fun is the frame rate issue lag. I'm using a galaxy 9s+ and the game slows down a lot even at 30 fps causing slow motion movements and me getting hit and killed alot. Good game but terrible port.

Having played and beaten the game on PC already, this is a decently impressive port. What it desperately needs is more control options, as Im using a PS4 controller and it still requires that some functions use the touchscreen. Complete integration of controller support and getting ridding of the touch prompts would make it a much fuller experince. Over all, worth it if you have a controller and high end phone/tablet. For refrence, I'm playing on a Galaxy Tab S7, runs near perfect max settings.
Made me coom!

close enough to the console port to be fun but it's still glitchy and the frame rate dips even when in 60fps mode. controller support needs work too. button mapping would make it that much better, or at least make the button layout the same as the console ports
Improving! Just get rid of those micro stutters and were square.
love it so much üòò

The game on pc is awesome, I bought it on android for the same reason, but I feel cheated by the company that developed it for android, it has an abusive privacy policy so I rejected it and I was unable to play it and it does not give me the option refund
Probably my phone (LG Stylo 6), but unplayable due to lag. üòí
Amazing game! I expect nothing less than this from the great man that put together Castlevania Symphony of the Night!

I like it but I'm trying to figure out why synching a controller still makes you use the touch screen some the time, with no option to fix that I saw..other than that, its a stellar game and I only bought it a second time to support IGA and all he's done for the castlevania series..also F Konami.
fix lag issue please
Great port. It still needs a little fixing, but with a physical controller its fantastic. Please have the on screen buttons disappear when using a controller (or maybe an option to hide them).

Really good game as far as the acuall game goes needs UI options move resize transparancy...allso needs a keymaper for controllers and proformance upgade i have a galaxy A71 8g ram and i lag on lowest settings and phone heats up

After update sometimes the control didn't respons , i have to restart the apps to make it normal. The achivement is error i play for 40+ hours (100% map and NG+) and i dont get marathon , chest achivement

The game is fun when you can actually jump half the time you actually she hits her head on something and you can't jump very high very frustrating to play improve the controls and I'll change my rating to a better rating
the controller support is mediocre for some thing i paid for it would be nice if it was full

Great way to play the game. Graphics are not too bad. Currently playing on a razer phone 2. Controller supports needs to have better options. As well there are moments frame rates hiccup. As of now, I'm hoping in the future this can be fixed. It will make the game overall a must buy. If you like having a portable alternative to the switch version.
Fun but laggy Might need to get a new phone to play it with out lag. Samsung Galaxy S7

As a castlevania series veteran and didn't try the console/PC version of this game before, i can say this game is perfect! Running smooth with my Mi10T pro with epic graphic and 60fps setting (tbh it offers higher setting if i'm not wrong) PS: for best experience, encourage you to use dedicated controller instead of relying with your phone screen. 90% of this game fully support with that and requires no mapping (only for accessing menu and map still require your screen tap)
Runs alright on Moto Z4, medium settings with Vsync off. Permissions when accessing Google account are extremely invasive, with no option to limit access if you want to play this game.

I just purchased the game but still laggy please make some adjustment i have OPPO A12 4G Ram..i have low graphics.i want to experience medium graphics with fluid movement specially in boss battles.please fix it or make an necessary adjustments.i want my purchased to be worth it thank you in advance
Really love the game. Remind me Castlevania SOTN

Definitely only buy this game if your phone has a Qualcomm Snapdragon processor or equivalent. Doesn't run too great above Medium graphics, but still plays way better on my newer Nokia 6.2 than on Moto G8 Power Lite. (Also, the game seems good so far in terms of gameplay and story.)
The graphics the sound and the story line are very good. This game is highly recommended.
I love the game. I hope they could add a function that we can able to customize mapping controls so it will be easier for me while using a gamepad. Keep up the good work
Controller support!!!! horrible horrible. Please fix asap! ROG 3 witj Kunai game pad

Works well with my Redmi 10X 5G; hydro stream visual fx can't display properly. ; Tower of twin dragons after boss batle the broken spiral walkways were fixed and can pass through without knowing it. Overall the game is very impressive. Hope to have more modes
Could do with some more patches but so far it's fun to play passing the time and has no Microtransactions
I'll say this much, it controls better than Konami's Castlevania Symphony of the Night Mobile. The controls aren't that bad.

The latest update brought the Jump Button as a pressed time base on touch button so Miriam will jump high or low based on how long we pressed the Button... This is getting better through each Updates, thank you for the hard works!
flawless port. I love this

it's a great game but with some apparent problems. firstly control, you drag the dpad instead of tapping it making it abit unresposive. also since the buttons are on the screen it sometimes covers some stuff. i wish there's more control and transparancy options. it's also abit buggy, like how after some play session some of the buttons won't respond to your tapping, requiring you to restart. there's also still quite laggy at times. wish these problems can be fixed.
Touch pad controller does not respond sometime.

The recent update added 60fps mode... Neat but it doesn't really fix the horrible frame rate. Yes, the update did fix the fps by a bit. However, the game still has frequent slow downs. Even on modern phones that run graphically intense games. The least I expect from this game is a smooth 30fps.

Having not played this game on any consoles or PC simply because I don't have them I do not have that experience to relate to but I can tell by playing the port of Castlevania symphony of the night that they could have done a better job making the controls more mobile friendly because unless you have a massive screen it takes quite a good bit of time to get used to how cramped the screen feels because of big thumbs and small screens and how precise some of the controls require you to be.

I changed my mind and really i need to give this game a 1 or 0 star. I thought the Upload option using "Cloud Archive" could restore my game which have 70% map and game stat. But still the game file was LOST. The Customer Service is also an IDIOT who has no idea how to help me to restore the game file that lost the save file via Cloud Archive - Download.. I raised a ticket and the agent replied which no good direction and tagged my ticket as resolved - completed but did not resolved the issue.
Superb!
The game stuck and crash..pls fix it
Lag and bad control Update Game update 60fts but control still bad.
Baller game. Metroidvania gold.

What da frick, why can't we fix this problem?? Still no controller support, the fps still doesn't fix this lag issue, and now, the game...crashes as I load my file. I'm afraid to reinstall the game just to start over. Why is this so hard to fix??? The old era of video gaming is so gone, no dev team can bring us a finished, well-tested game and this $10 fiasco is not impressive!! You're destroying a dam good game! Terrible!
Cant get past the first boss of the game. Screen just gone white.
this is mega. been looking for something like sotn and this ticks all the boxes

Game is beautiful, though it does have frame drop and stuttering. The touch controls can be Janky and sometimes takes determination..most of the time she acts like her head hits a solid object and won't do a full jump, at times buttons act like they weren't touched at all. Still waited awhile to play this so low as I'll go atm is 4* I suspect things will improve.

Poorly optimized with severe frame rate hiccups/skipping and VERY poorly implemented bluetooth controller support. I'll never understand why game porting companies always take a "we'll-finish-it-if-it-sells" approach to releasing games; it's everything that's wrong with the industry! Here's an idea for the LazyPortDevs: playtest games BEFORE releasing them! Fix bugs BEFORE release time! Make sure the game WORKS PROPERLY on a majority of devices before you slop it out to the masses!

Great game. Seems to be locked at 30 fps unfortunately. As I didn't experience any dips yet I own a s20 ultra which is much faster than a Nintendo switch , which this game is also released on. Graphics and audio are both great. Controls are great as well. Worth 10 bucks if you have a capable device. If you have anything less than a SD865 SoC tho I wouldn't bother as itll run poorly. **they added a 60 fps mode. But unfortunately it seems to run at 60 fps until my phone gets too hot about 10min
Overall, the game is a pretty good portal, but camera with phone controls block the player and/or the monster.

Update: Thankfully NetEase has removed the 30 FPS cap and bumped it to 60 FPS (check the games settings again, there is now a "60 FPS mode" make sure you toggle that on). I now get a solid 50-60 FPS on ultra-setting on my S10+ (snapdragon model). So, performance seems great. Sadly, controller support is still in the same state (tested with an Xbox One controller). You can use a controller to play the actual game but anything involving a menu of any kind (opening inv, using potions, equipping items etc) does not respond at all to controller input. Really hope to see them iron out controller support and fully support it so you can play the entire game with a controller if you want to.

Playing on a Samsung Galaxy S9+ with insane lag and below 30fps even on low graphics, I don't care about graphics as long as it runs smoothly, PLEASE fix it asap :) Edit: Latest update fixed most of the fps issues, though there's still some freezing happening when I enter new zones..
Game freezes before first boss fight. C'mon
Wouldn't even open on my phone and its brand new, it looks decent enough, but until it actually works 1 star is all it gets.

Well 3 stars because when i updated it, it starts to crash . Everytime I open the app it auto closes. I really want this game badly and this is my first time purchase in google play. Please fix it quickly thank you
Great game on pc, mobile crashes on blank white boat tutorial with the red masked guy cutscene.

This game is great on pc however my experience with mobile has been extremely shot from my perspective. Wierd frame stuttering, terrible ui and extreme difficulty using weapon special moves. Until they add an option to fix the movement controls and change button positioning and size. This game won't pass 3 stars for me and definitely if it keeps frame stuttering on me.
I love all of this game.Thanks for make me enjoy on mobile.
Definitely a must for SOTN fans üëç
Unresponsive controlls still plauge the game , but the 1st updates fixed the gameplay for me, hopefully they will continue updating the game

Since the latest update, the game seems much more playable using controllers. The game quit menu shows up when opening the map. And menus aren't navigatable using controllers. Other than that the game is good. Please keep making improvements. I'm a big castlevania fan.
Doesn't work It says I need to set up key or whatever but 0 instructions how to do it.

Note 20 ultra 5g. Installed, played for about 5 my mins. Phone power button wouldn't work. Finally turned on. Put it on the charger, went to bed, and when I woke up phone had soft rest into safe mode. Had to restart to enable apps. Phone had reset to default settings. As much as I wanna support the company I can't trust the app to make my flagship spec phone bug the eff out. Makes no sense. Hope it gets fixed. I'll try it again in the future. Maybe.

Very fun game! Recommend this game to any Metroidvania fan. game runs 60fps on Epic on my Galaxy S10+ however, there are some minor occasional stutters. I think this is a problem in the game itself which can probably be patched out later on.
I have a lot of framerate problems, it is very frustrating to jump and not responding at midair because of it Apart from that the game is good
I love this game on ps4. They just added controller connectivity and works great. I use ps4 controller. Needs touch ups but totally worth 10 bucks.
Loved this game on Xbox and PC, surprised at how well it holds up and plays on mobile. Very good port, at least as of the town area.

Metroidvania fans must play this if you like metroid or Castlevania this game is for you. course if you don't know what I'm talkin about it's still a great game to play for first time players of the genre. for only $10 this game is definitely worth of the title. you definitely want to get a controller though to play it otherwise even the most nimble list of fingers it couldn't play this game properly üòí. other than the lack of controls this game is so great play. and a decent story at that
The quintessential modern Metroidvania, heavy on the Vania.
Bloodstained es un buen juego, lo jugu√© en consolas y es recordar Castlevania SOTN, el problema con el port es el lag y el delay.
Make compatible to controller
Almost exactly like the play station game.
does not run so hot on my Xperia one mkII apart from that nice game probs decent port I don't know to be honest.
after i apply 60fps it was good then suddenly it gets laggy a bit but overall is nice keep up the good work 4* for now maybe fix the lagg issues in scenematic then i make it 5 * üòÖüëå
Just loved it!! At least try it once. You will love it as I do.
a few kinks to work out but overall it's amazing
victor nash Game has better performance than the nintendo switch version. The only issue I have is the on screen buttons when I am using a physical gamepad.
Finally Bloodstained on the go. But... Please add 60 fps and on screen controll customization and controller support.
definetly need a strong phone to play properly, but the touch controls arent bad, and the game got ported amazingly, definetly worth it if youve got a good enough device!
With the latest update, i can finally enjoy the game! Nice follow up on previous issues!

With the new update it runs better. Still has room for improvenent. In terms of options add seperate graphics and resolution options, i dont care as much for details as for resolution, but on higher settings my phone doesnt handle everything too well. I still experience some freezes pretty often, usually for a split second, besides freezing fps has been pretty much fixed, at least for me. Load times between doors are still really long tho idk if that can even be fixed.
Latest version fixed my complaints! Five star
Its Bloodstained on mobile! What more can you ask for? I think they did a fantastic job at it. Look sis, nothing is perfect but hey its playable and definitely worth every penny.
Good game and thank you for the 60fps mode - needs the following update 144 fps / remove on screen input when using a controller / controller support on everything (menu etc) like grimvalor
Excellent. Only one thing that makes this game any what bad. The controls.
I love this game. The mobile port does suffer from a bit of lag and bad fps. All I can hope for is they port it over to android tv so I can play on my Nvidia shield!
Amazing Game to Have on Mobile.. Absolutely Beautiful Game Can't wait to see further Updates !! Great Work Team !!
Pretty poop, doing a short hop is so hard to pull off and doing combos is hard to do.
Horrible port . Stay away from this game.

Loving the game, and that fact that it runs almost smoothly on a phone is mind blowing!! Please pop out an update to optimize! Im enjoying very much! Playing on SD 865 + bebooncool bluetooth controller
Would be perfect if the controller support was better
Fix the issue on the first boss fight.. i only got white screen on it and can't proceed!
Controls always have delays and glitches. Graphics is good but sometimes it crushes and lagging.
It lags and freeze sometimes. But I finished the main story. It is good overall
Good
Major fps problem

Is it just me having this problem: When I use Thrashing Tentacle...umm...there's no Tentacle(s)... rendering the move useless. I've seen footage of the move and there are definitely tentacles coming out of the sigil. Not for me though. Not a deal breaker...but disappointing. As far as everything else...meh...read the other reviews. We all agree this game needs an update STAT. The game is still playable and I'm enjoying it. But for 10.00 bucks I expect something better than "playable".

Control sometimes, bugged and not responsive, using weapon's technique are plain horrible experience, tons of times, will walk forward continuesly after using technique, would be better if there is shortcut for skills instead of swiping attack button
This is really a very brilliant game. The overall gameplay has some nostalgia (like how you play most of CastleVania games), even the plot too.

1-star review because the kickstarter for ROTN promised a Linux version, backed out on it without refunding backers, and now here we are in 2020 with a $10 android port they said couldn't be done. Framerate is kinda bad, it skips and stutters when loading new areas, and the game is choppy on my Chromebook, runs so-so on a ROG phone.

The game never makes it past the first logo and I am redownloading hoping this problem is fixed by doing this if not please fix asap and provide the same amount of button options as controller please that takes away from game play the les buttons means less a abilities and other things A-B-X-Y-LT-LB-RT-RB they need not be large just big enough to see and use easily shrink them down a bit and that will save on screen space as well for the people who do not have controllera
Rather good. Will recommend to others.
Its a really good game the only thing i would like to feedback is that the controls are times not very responsive. If that gets fixed then it's all good.

Just like with the Castlevania entries on the GBA and DS, this game allows you to backtrack and find new areas once you attain more abilities. Straddling the line between linear and open world, there is a natural progression amongst the puzzle solving and shard collecting. It's great to see the spirit of modern-day Castlevania games living on, albeit under a different title.
Convenient on smart phone.
As a metroidvania enthusiast and a fan of the castlevania series... this game was a love letter to it all. It is worth its money. Can't complaint more.

This game doesn't look polished enough for mobile release, not worth $10. Next to Grimvalor, this game is very disappointing on mobile. Grimvalor is much smoother with similar graphics quality, and on-screen controls are adapted much better to mobile.
The gameplay is sharp and well balanced, and the graphics pop thanks to the anime-esque quality.5 stars of course, should be 10 out of 10.

Finally, I don't need to buy a Switch to play this game but sadly I somehow regret buying this game this early. No option for 60FPS, load times when switching rooms are long, lags pretty often even though I'm using a high-end phone, controller support only for in-game and not for menus, and no option to turn off on-screen buttons. I only got to the second save point, will play again once all of the above stuff I mentioned are fixed.
We need gampad contols please. Overall this game is great. Mastered symphony of the night here so i want to see what this game can offer.

So it's okay to play so far, but the graphics are a little broken. Also I'm having some controls issues during a fight. Is there a way you guys can put costumize controls? I would make it a little bigger and put the transparency mode. Please do it soüôèüèª.
After the update, controls are responsive. Especially the jump button. Goodjob
gameplay is good, graphic good but control not good, when learn or use skill from weap is hard to use it... overall good

This is not right. I have been waiting months for the game to be on Android and even despite the other bad reviews I bought the game for $9.99 . It downloads fine and when I open the app it loads asked me for permissions . Ok then the app closes every time I have tried to play. Please help resolve this issue.
it's a better version graphically to nintendo switch but my issue with this game is that you can't customize the layout touch buttons.. maybe the next update will address this issue...

Lagfest. I have a good phone and it stutters constantly no matter the quality chosen. It runs between 15 to 30 fps (even at the lowest setting). It has other issues too (unresponsible touch, unfinished gamepad support, random crashes, bad translation). The port is sloppy. Read reviews before buying. I asked for a refund but I'm yet to hear anything. First and last game I buy/download from Netease. Almost forgot, it also installs a folders on internal storage with chinese files in it. Why?

I think half the reviewers here are crazy. Looks fine and plays fine. Yes, it's a more demanding game and yes that means you need a better phone than average, but the game has graphics settings you can adjust down. The touch controls can use some practice but I'm througholy impressed.
recommended!
So far so good

Its good, very entertaining.Great graphics, nothing to worry about playing on your phone. NE did a very good job this time. Smooth game play. Great voicing acting. Lots of content to walk through. The machanic is rather interesting.
I am so happy to have a full console port on Android with controller support. But hey, devs, please update the game to turn off touch screen controls when a physical controller is being used.
Fun

Absolutely an amazing port onto mobile devices! I feel it looks better than the Switch port. I would give it 5 stars, but the lack of controller support and the game freezing in certain areas where I can no longer progress hinder it. Once these issues are addressed, I'll gladly bump it up to 5 stars!
Its unplayable, what a waste
Bad gamepad support. Has random slowdowns on my Pixel 4 XL. Crashes often. Wish I could get my money back. Hopefully they fix the bugs soon
It's great port from PC and I really satisfied. The reason why I rate 4 star bcs u can't customize your control both from touch and gamepad. I just hope next update you can do it.
Awesome! but the control still lags.

Playing this on a Pixel 5 and running it with the graphics options set to epic...It runs pretty well; as other people have mentioned, there are some minor issues...Definitely needs an optimization patch, removing onscreen UI when using a controller, etc., but overall it runs better than I was expecting...Five stars once these minor issues are ironed out...

Finally Bloodstained on mobile port don't mind buying it since I'm a huge fan of Metroidvania games. The graphics is nice, controls is kinda smooth and the sound is superb, it is only bit slow but maybe because of my phone but still give a perfect 5 for a job well done.
Nice attempt but no controller support is an automatic refund.

Amazing game!! If you are a Castlevania fan, then this game is a must! Controls are smooth and gameplay is excellent. If you have a phone gamepad like ROG Kunai 3 or Razer Kishi, then the experience will be even better! I totally recommend this game!!

Was waiting for this on mobile. I finished it on PC a few times game itself is really good I rarely play games to the end these days. I'm playing this on a tab 7+ at epic settings only get the odd hitch rarely. Probably still runs better then the switch version on this device at least for the price its worth it console level game.

The game can be a big laggy, there is no particular pattern when and how lags occur. There are some minor graphical glitches. I also managed to hardlock the game several times - before the first boss fight (there was just a white screen) and after exiting the teleportation glass. It will be nice if there will be an option to turn off on-screen controls for gamepad users and gamepad support overall. I really enjoyed the game on pc before and hope it gets patched on android fairly soon.

Great game, 2nd time purchasing so I could play it on my phone. My only gripe so far is that the on-screen controls still show when using my Bluetooth controller, obstructing some of the screen unnecessarily. Also when in menus/inventory the controller doesn't work, forcing you to use the touchscreen. Not a huge deal but just a couple things I'd like to see fixed before I really start back up playing this game again.
Great game. Can play offline. Nostalgic feeling of Castlevania.

A good game overall, but needs far far better controller support than it currently offers and fps options to go along with the current graphics settings. Also once in a while some Japanese still pops up but this is a very minor issue compared to the controller and fps ones.
So far everything is going great üåπ
Fantastic! This is what a premium game should be. Pay once and enjoy. Works great with a controller too. Gameplay is smooth and intense. Plays great on Rog Phone 3.
Its good however the graphics are a little broken and there is input lag needs more work not worth 10 buck at the moment wait
Original gameplay from console ! Good quality, reasonable price ! Graphics need to improve , overall Nice !

Played til the first save point to test basic stuff, game runs visually a little slow but gameplay wise absolutely fine (HTC U12+) there are a couple of minor translation issues and a Bluetooth controller does work but only in game not in the menus and there are no settings to turn off the on screen buttons. Can't wait to play this game on a new platform the pc version is fantastic. Some definite improvements could be made but not too shabby. Don't know what microtransactions there are, worried.
Port feels laggy on first day and the controller support is lacking. Please give an option to remove the touch control UI when a controller is connected

So far, so damn good! A very good port of the game. Runs at what seems to be a pretty steady 30 fps on my Note 20 ultra (SD865) and the touch controls are actually responsive and precise for touch controls.
Pretty good so far. Just finished the boat with graphics set to epic and had no real issues. I feel the on screen jump button doesn't work from time to time though

I love Bloodstained on pc port, but on android seems lackluster. The controls are the same yet the menu is not ready to use controller and I can't seem to navigate through the UI and menus. Quality in terms is expected to be lesser in an android port, but the stutters happen quite often (I'm using a Huawei p20 pro), I will not request the refund because I belive in the team, but this needs to be fixed for a better rate. Thank you.
This game this need more optimization, the game still good but the control are horrid to get used.

So far so good as a mobile port. I expect frame rate issues and minor things. Near perfect, will change with updates. Saw a Japanese instructional popup so there's minor translation issues and turned off vibrate but still vibrates in areas, minor tweaks and this will easily get a 5 star.

10 euros upfront PLUS in app purchases? when the PC version has no microtransactions at all? unacceptable. also game is blurry and laggy even on a very good phone. Play the PC version instead, it's a masterpiece.
